role:

services-ml:
Machine Learning and Deep Learning create value for businesses, making them a must-have for competitive companies.

I use the most powerful tools on the market to turn your data into strategic advice and take your business to the next level.

I make my Machine Learning models easy to work with by incorporating them in a user-friendly interface with Python Dash.
services-python:
Carrying out cumbersome and repetitive tasks is boring and costy. Automate such tasks to save time and focus on what actually matters.

I write Python code to power your needs. I let you appropriately interact with them:
Tech-heavy collaborators will use it? I can write an API in Flask.
End-users need a GUI? I can make a beautiful web application in Dash.
services-ds:
Sometimes you have a great team that just needs a little upskill. Avoid wasting resources on recruitment by giving them a targeted training that fits your needs.

I give professional trainings that go straight to the point, where I provide all the keys to tackle your real world problems.
Need something more advanced? Thanks to my background in Mathematics, I can dive deeper to teach the ins and outs of popular algorithms.
